body_html:
We are planning to convert docs to use Jupyter format, where it makes sense.

So it will might be nice to have a GPU+Jupyter option when that happens, as some of the tutorials are pretty heavy, but it's hard to gauge how many users this would help.
body_text:
We are planning to convert docs to use Jupyter format, where it makes sense.
So it will might be nice to have a GPU+Jupyter option when that happens, as some of the tutorials are pretty heavy, but it's hard to gauge how many users this would help.
body:
We are _planning_ to convert docs to use Jupyter format, where it makes sense. 

So it will might be nice to have a GPU+Jupyter option when that happens, as some of the tutorials are pretty heavy, but it's hard to gauge how many users this would help.
